title: I cannot make a discussion
body: For some reason i am not allowed to create a discussion anywhere unless it is under "BOARDS HOME" unless i am level 7, i am level 30, assuming it is talking about in game level.

replies.body: Sounds like your profile still needed to sync to the boards.  If you still have any issues, our [syncing tool](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool) should help!
